content.prompt: According to the graph, which of the following best explains how adverse childhood experiences (ACEs) relate to behavior and mental processes?

choices.label: ACEs affect childhood experiences, but do not have lasting effects into adulthood.
ACEs solely impact cognitive processes and have no direct correlation with social development.
ACEs can contribute to behavioral issues and altered mental processes.
Children raised with authoritative parents are more likely to experience higher levels of ACEs.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
